content: The FHIRPath expression for Patient deceased search parameter is Patient.deceased.exists() which evaluates to true where deceasedBoolean is set as false. There was some conversation previously on this acknowledging that it is wrong, but I am not able to find what the fix is and I am not able to locate any tracker items. Can someone please let me know of the fix?
Is my understanding of exists() wrong? Or is the matching of deceasedBoolean=false by intent?
I see that this same expression is used even in the current build in build.fhir.org. Should I submit a tracker item?
